alert.note: Alert for Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:29PM CDT until June 13 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Lakin, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lakin and Deerfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
